controller.body:
do ->

	$1 = ($rootScope, $scope, $state, $log) ->

		vm = this

		vm.main = ->
			$log.info 'main $1...'
			return

		vm.main()

		## $1
		return

	'use strict'
	angular.module('$2').controller '$1', $1
	$1.$inject = [
		'$rootScope'
		'$scope'
		'$state'
		'$log'
	]
	return

service.body:
do ->
	$1 = ($rootScope, $log) ->

		@$2 = ($3) ->
			$log.warn 'awesome service!'
			#$2
			return
		#$1
		return

	'use strict'
	angular.module('$4').service '$1', $1
	$1.$inject = [
		'$rootScope'
		'$log'
	]
	return
